events.message: I recently bought a pair of headphones from your store, but I want to return them because they do not meet my expectations.
The system has classified this issue as a refund request based on the customer's request to return the product.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for the returned headphones.
Hello! I'm here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, please share the order number and reason for the return in detail.
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The headphones are larger than expected and don’t fit well.
Thank you for the details. You can return the headphones within 30 days for a full refund. I will send you the return shipping label.
That sounds perfect, thanks! I appreciate the quick help and will send the package back today.
The return shipping label has been emailed to you. Once we receive the item back, your refund will be processed immediately.
Just checking in to confirm that you have returned the headphones and if you have received your refund yet.
Yes, I returned the headphones yesterday, and the refund was credited to my account today. Thank you!
We have marked your refund case as closed. If you need any further assistance, please don’t hesitate to contact us.
To help us improve, we’ve sent a survey regarding your recent refund experience. We appreciate your feedback.
